titleStmt.title: A suruay of the pretended holy discipline. Contayning the beginninges, successe, parts, proceedings, authority, and doctrine of it: with some of the manifold, and materiall repugnances, varieties and vncertaineties, in that behalfe
titleStmt.author: Bancroft, Richard, 1544-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Wolfe [, Thomas Scarlet, and Richard Field],

notesStmt.note: "T. Scarlet app[arently]. pr[inted]. R-V, 2O-2R; R. Field 2K-2N, 3C-3E, 3I-3K; Wolfe the rest"--STC addendum.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
